tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
im harivardhan from hyderabad. for almost two years i suffered from fungal infection around my waist. I've consulted other doctors and they diagnosed it as Taenia Corporis but i couldn't find proper treatment for two years and had a terrible time with the infection. It was badly itchy and uncomfortable, I had to avoid certain food and other habits, I had to change my clothing and it was a pretty bad experience.

And then I got to know about Dr. Subhash Chander of the new life advanced homeo care the new life advanced homeo and I consulted with him and he gave a medication which i continued for an year and as bad as the experience was before using homeopathy, things turned out that good gradually. The medicines cured the skin infection completely around the waist and the skin is back to normal now. since then i didn't get any recurring infections on any part of the body. Whatever the health issues are, no matter how worse they are, i can recommend new life advanced homeo care with pretty great hope and confidence.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been residing in USA, for last few years. In 2022, had a rash on my cheeks and nose. Upon consultation with Dermatologist started using prescribed ointment. Started seeingspots on my forehead too. Dermatologist changed ointments multiple times, one of them hadadverse reactions and that caused a lot of pigmentations/burning effects on face. Biopsy revealed, Lichen planus condition. An autoimmune disorder. Its cause and treatment are not known to science yet.In 2023 summer visited India. Upon recommendation of my family, have seen Dr Subhash Chander, whom they have seen in the past and very happy with the results. Dr Subhash Chander has viewed skin condition and started treatment, within 2 weeks, I have noticed slight difference. Six weeks into treatment there was drastic improvement in visual appearance. Now it's been close to 3 months into treatment and the issue has resolved with 70% clearer skin. Upon returning back to USA and during follow-up appointment with Dermatologist, he was surprised to see the skin. Thanks to Dr Subhash Chander and I would highly recommend him for any type of health issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
My name is Rohan Agarwal,18 years. For the last 4 years I have severe back  ache. On taking expert treatment I was given pain killers . In the last 10 months my situation became worse and I started getting pain in the shoulders, knees  In addition  to back ache. Expert doctor advised me to take blood test and it was confirmed that  I am HLA-B27 positive.  Which means I have a disease known as Ankylosing Spondylitis which has bought no cure which I confirmed from the internet. The expert doctors advised me to do  regular physical therapy for life long and some vitamins .
             My condition did not improve and I was very much worried.  So were my parents. I approached Dr. Subhash Chander Gadde at New Life Homeo Clinic with his treatment  I started getting lot  of relief in the last 3 months , my  pain have reduced a lot and I am able to  perform my daily activities and studies.  I have started playing cricket  again.  I am very happy with the treatment of Dr. Subhash and also confident that I will be cured completely very soon 
        I would recommend to approach Dr.subhash for any difficult or helpless medical conditions . I am grateful to Dr. Subhash.

Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
context: kidney and gall bladder stones,Skin infections,Acidity Treatment,Diabetes Treatment,
review:
My mother had been a patient of GBS since 2013. She also has diabetes, Glaucoma and urinary problems. We have visited many Specialist hospitals but to no respite. All the medications provided temporary relief. Even expert doctors are of the opinion that GBS has no cure. They opined that only the present condition can be maintained with continuous physiotherapy.
      After meeting Dr Subash Chander, we got a feeling that this treatment is different from others. We experienced the same after we started medication. We could experience a sudden improvement in her health condition after the first dose of medication itself which is very rare in Homeopathy. We are presently undergoing the course. Will also review after the end of the treatment.

     The treatment provided by Dr Subhash is unique. Suggest this treatment to everyone. The clinic is especially meant for difficult and non-curable diseases.

context: Pre and Post operative conditions,Diabetes Treatment,
review:
My father, 63, had a heart attack on March 22. As it was an emergency, he was taken to the hospital. Two stunts were placed. After that, my father became very weak. Sugar levels went too high. Creatinine levels have also increased. My father had started to take many expensive medicines from many experts to reduce them for 5 months. But there was no significant benefit.
I knew Subhash Sir from before for Covid19 treatment, so I contacted him. I informed him about my father's problems. He came to know about my father's every problem. Dr. Subhash of New life homeo clinic at Hyderabad reviewed all of the reports and administered the medication. Now it has been three months with his homeopathic treatment. My father has undergone a transformation. He is recovering from all his health issues. Both the creatinine. and sugar levels are now normal. He miraculously recovered in three months and is much active and enjoying the recovery.
Many thanks to Dr. Subash Sir.

I am very happy with the fast results of homeopathy treatment by Dr. Subhash chandar of New Life Homeo Clinic.
